mapper.select: SELECT EZC_FACL_AMENT.FACL_CD AS faclCd /* 시설 코드, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,EZC_FACL_AMENT.AMENT_TYPE AS amentType /* 부대시설 유형, VARCHAR2(8) */ ,EZC_FACL_AMENT.REG_ID AS regId /* 등록자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,EZC_FACL_AMENT.REG_DT AS regDt /* 등록 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */ ,EZC_FACL_AMENT.MODI_ID AS modiId /* 수정자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,EZC_FACL_AMENT.MODI_DT AS modiDt /* 수정 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */ FROM EZC_FACL_AMENT /* 시설 부대시설 */ ,EZC_FACL /* 시설 정보 */ ,EZC_AREA_CD /* 지역 코드 */ ,EZC_CITY_CD /* 도시 코드 */ ,EZC_PARTNER /* 제휴사 정보 */ WHERE 1=1 AND EZC_FACL_AMENT.FACL_CD = EZC_FACL.FACL_CD AND EZC_FACL.AREA_CD = EZC_AREA_CD.AREA_CD AND EZC_AREA_CD.CITY_CD = EZC_CITY_CD.CITY_CD AND EZC_FACL.CITY_CD = EZC_CITY_CD.CITY_CD AND EZC_FACL.PARTNER_CD = EZC_PARTNER.PARTNER_CD AND EZC_FACL_AMENT.FACL_CD = #{faclCd, jdbcType=DECIMAL} /* 시설 코드, NUMBER(0,22), EZC_FACL_AMENT_PK(P),FK_EZC_FACL_EZC_FACL_AMENT(R),SYS_C0011077(C) */ AND EZC_FACL_AMENT.AMENT_TYPE = #{amentType, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 부대시설 유형, VARCHAR2(8), EZC_FACL_AMENT_PK(P),SYS_C0011078(C) */

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM EZC_FACL_AMENT /* 시설 부대시설 */ ,EZC_FACL /* 시설 정보 */ ,EZC_AREA_CD /* 지역 코드 */ ,EZC_CITY_CD /* 도시 코드 */ ,EZC_PARTNER /* 제휴사 정보 */ WHERE 1=1 AND EZC_FACL_AMENT.FACL_CD = EZC_FACL.FACL_CD AND EZC_FACL.AREA_CD = EZC_AREA_CD.AREA_CD AND EZC_AREA_CD.CITY_CD = EZC_CITY_CD.CITY_CD AND EZC_FACL.CITY_CD = EZC_CITY_CD.CITY_CD AND EZC_FACL.PARTNER_CD = EZC_PARTNER.PARTNER_CD
AND EZC_FACL_AMENT.FACL_CD = #{faclCd, jdbcType=DECIMAL} /* 시설 코드, NUMBER(0,22) */
AND EZC_FACL_AMENT.AMENT_TYPE = #{amentType, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 부대시설 유형, VARCHAR2(8) */
AND EZC_FACL_AMENT.REG_ID = #{regId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 등록자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */
AND EZC_FACL_AMENT.REG_DT = #{regDt, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 등록 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */
AND EZC_FACL_AMENT.MODI_ID = #{modiId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 수정자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */
AND EZC_FACL_AMENT.MODI_DT = #{modiDt, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 수정 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS ROW__NUM, RECORDS.* FROM ( /* SQL Body Start */ SELECT EZC_FACL_AMENT.FACL_CD AS faclCd /* 시설 코드, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,EZC_FACL_AMENT.AMENT_TYPE AS amentType /* 부대시설 유형, VARCHAR2(8) */ ,EZC_FACL_AMENT.REG_ID AS regId /* 등록자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,EZC_FACL_AMENT.REG_DT AS regDt /* 등록 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */ ,EZC_FACL_AMENT.MODI_ID AS modiId /* 수정자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,EZC_FACL_AMENT.MODI_DT AS modiDt /* 수정 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */ FROM EZC_FACL_AMENT /* 시설 부대시설 */ ,EZC_FACL /* 시설 정보 */ ,EZC_AREA_CD /* 지역 코드 */ ,EZC_CITY_CD /* 도시 코드 */ ,EZC_PARTNER /* 제휴사 정보 */ WHERE 1=1 AND EZC_FACL_AMENT.FACL_CD = EZC_FACL.FACL_CD AND EZC_FACL.AREA_CD = EZC_AREA_CD.AREA_CD AND EZC_AREA_CD.CITY_CD = EZC_CITY_CD.CITY_CD AND EZC_FACL.CITY_CD = EZC_CITY_CD.CITY_CD AND EZC_FACL.PARTNER_CD = EZC_PARTNER.PARTNER_CD
AND EZC_FACL_AMENT.FACL_CD = #{faclCd, jdbcType=DECIMAL} /* 시설 코드, NUMBER(0,22) */
AND EZC_FACL_AMENT.AMENT_TYPE = #{amentType, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 부대시설 유형, VARCHAR2(8) */
AND EZC_FACL_AMENT.REG_ID = #{regId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 등록자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */
AND EZC_FACL_AMENT.REG_DT = #{regDt, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 등록 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */
AND EZC_FACL_AMENT.MODI_ID = #{modiId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 수정자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */
AND EZC_FACL_AMENT.MODI_DT = #{modiDt, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 수정 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */
ORDER BY EZC_FACL_AMENT.FACL_CD DESC /* SQL Body End */ ) RECORDS WHERE ROWNUM <= ((#{pageNum, jdbcType=NUMERIC}*#{pageCount, jdbcType=NUMERIC})+1) ) WHERE ROW__NUM > (#{pageNum, jdbcType=NUMERIC}-1)*#{pageCount, jdbcType=NUMERIC}
mapper.update: UPDATE EZC_FACL_AMENT SET /* 시설 부대시설 */ MODI_ID = #{modiId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 수정자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,MODI_DT = #{modiDt, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 수정 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */ WHERE 1=1 AND FACL_CD = #{faclCd, jdbcType=DECIMAL} /* 시설 코드, NUMBER(0,22) */ AND AMENT_TYPE = #{amentType, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 부대시설 유형, VARCHAR2(8) */
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM EZC_FACL_AMENT /* 시설 부대시설 */ WHERE 1=1 AND FACL_CD = #{faclCd, jdbcType=DECIMAL} /* 시설 코드, NUMBER(0,22) */ AND AMENT_TYPE = #{amentType, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 부대시설 유형, VARCHAR2(8) */
